definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: The time spent reading reference materials was also added to the total preparation time.
sentences.chinese: 这个耗时的阅读参考资料也要算作预备工作的时间。

sentences.english: Please refer to the Resources section for further details.
sentences.chinese: 请参看参考资料部分进一步了解细节。

sentences.english: I hope you take some time to look at some of the references below.
sentences.chinese: 我希望您花些时间看看下面的一些参考资料。

sentences.english: Wikipedia is increasingly becoming the default reference for the curious.
sentences.chinese: 维基百科越来越成为古怪事项上人们默认的参考资料。
还有许多其他参考资料。

sentences.english: I have loaded my thesis with references.
sentences.chinese: 我在论文中引用了大量参考资料。

sentences.english: The other appendices provide reference material and an extended example.
sentences.chinese: 其他的附录提供参考资料和扩展的实例。

sentences.english: Most programming references include a discussion of writing threadsafe routines.
sentences.chinese: 许多编程参考资料讨论了如何编写线程安全的例程。

sentences.english: References may be either footnoted or endnoted.
sentences.chinese: 参考资料可以在注脚或文章末端标明。

sentences.english: For more information, please refer to the handbooks listed under the Resources section.
sentences.chinese: 关于更多信息，请查阅参考资料小节所列出的手册。

sentences.english: The links in Resources section below will help you get started.
sentences.chinese: 下面的参考资料部分中的链接将帮助您入门。

sentences.english: You can go to the information desk to ask for more reference.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去谘询台要更多参考资料。

sentences.english: The help environment becomes an invaluable reference resource.
sentences.chinese: 帮助环境成了一种无价的参考资料。

sentences.english: The real problem area when it comes to filing is reference material.
sentences.chinese: 其实说到编档，真正的问题所在是那些参考资料。

sentences.english: Each chapter is referenced in minute detail.
sentences.chinese: 每一章后面都附有极为详尽的参考资料。

sentences.english: The following is a list of some useful references and resources.
sentences.chinese: 下面列出了一些非常有用的参考资料和资源。

definition: marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text

Draft History of the Qing Dynasty, sometimes listed as number 25 or 26 of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Zhao Erxun 趙爾巽|赵尔巽[Zhao4 Er3 xun4] in 1927 during the Northern Warlords period, 536 scrolls

A Mirror for the Wise Ruler (or Comprehensive Mirror for Aid in Government), a vast chronological general history, written by 司馬光|司马光[Si1 ma3 Guang1] Sima Guang (1019-1089) and collaborators during the Northern Song in 1084, covering the period 403 BC-959 AD, 294 scrolls

History of the Song Dynasty, twentieth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 496 scrolls/(not to be confused with 宋書|宋书[Song4 shu1])
History of the Ming Dynasty, twenty fourth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Zhang Tingyu 張廷玉|张廷玉[Zhang1 Ting2 yu4] in 1739 during the Qing Dynasty, 332 scrolls
